name: The Tingling
description:
Second game by ilkyaz and can, made in 72  hours for Ludum Dare 45. For our first game, see Hell Shower.
We participated at BUG once again. The place is like home to us.

The game:
You are in the hospital, unable to move. The doctor desperately wants to see some hope. The least you can do is moving one toe. But can you do it?

The making of the game:

  • We used Construct 2 and given that it's the free version, the number of events that take place is no more than 100.
  • Once again our game lacks sound. We'll make up for that in our next game. We have pause and restart options this time, don't we?
  • We know the game is quite difficult. It's meant to be that way.
